lines.text: [Repeated line]
I HEAR YOU!
So, all we have to do is knock a hole in the wall and let the sunshine in.
Why don't you knock a hole in your head and let some brains in.

[after Denise tells him she's pregnant]
You're gonna make a terrific mother. And Pete will make a fine... playmate for the child.
You heard it from the horse's mouth.
And now we're hearing it from the other end.
Benson, what's a broken heart?
Oh, there's no such thing, Katie. It's just a term we use to describe one of life's little disappointment that comes close to killing you.
I make money the old-fashioned way. I inherit it.
[Marcie is checking on the results of an election Taylor was running in]
So how did Taylor do?
He lost. He came in sixth.
How did he come in sixth? There were only five candidates.
There was a large write-in for "None of the above".
I'll never be a hero. I had a chance once. Janine's cat was drowning in the pool and I jumped in to save it. But when I realized I had to give it mouth-to-mouth, I threw it back in.
Clipper ship bound for Spain, all that gold and Phillipe. How romantic. I hope the ship sank.
[Benson meets Kraus for the first time]
You are getting muddy footprints all over my clean floor and it is disgusting!
Fine, I'll walk on my hands.
[Benson meets the governor for the first time]
Governor Gatling, I'd like to introduce...
Introduce? Oh, this man needs no introduction. I'd know the Reverend Jesse Jackson anywhere.
[Benson is at home when the phone rings]

[answering the phone]
Hello? Oh, hi, governor. Sure, you can come over. All right, see you then. Bye.
[Benson hangs up. A few seconds later, the doorbell rings. Benson answers it to find the governor at the door]
What'd you do? Beam over?
[Benson walks into the governor's office]
Benson, I must be psychic. I was just thinking of you and here you are.
Governor, you sent for me.
Oh. That's probably why I was thinking of you.
I'm going out and have myself a wild time.
Don't forget your library card.
Mister DeBasie?
Dubois, Senator. I think you had me confused with COUNT DeBasie.
Hi, Denise. Whatcha reading?
It's a magazine article that uses the quantum theory to describe infinity.
Is it any good?
Yeah, but it goes on forever.

[Benson is firing a pain-in-the-neck staffer]
It hasn't been sweet, but hallelujah, it's been short.
You insult my cooking. You insult my looks. You insult the way I dress...
Did I miss something?
[the snowplowers are on strike]
Why don't we call out the National Guard for this?
We can't. I sent them to New Mexico for desert training.
Desert training? There's no desert around here!
I know. That's why I sent them to New Mexico.
Marcy, Marcy, Marcy... when a horse breaks its leg, you shoot it.
I don't know anything about horses, but I know a jackass when I see one!
